name: Floors (itch) (JKGameDev)
description:
You´re stuck in some kind of underground building, and need to get food and water in the floors of this building to survive, but, for what?

How did you get here?

-You don´t remember.

And...

Can you get out?

-No one knows...

_____________________________________________________________________________________

–Use WASD to move

–E to interact

–And ‘R’ to restart the level

Try to get all the items in the level and return to the place you started, then press ‘E’ to go back to your camp.
